typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		col1 as integer,
		load_dt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source
source(output(
		sg_key as integer,
		col1 as integer,
		load_start_dt as timestamp,
		load_end_dt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> lkp
source, lkp lookup(source@col1 == lkp@col1,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupTGT
LookupTGT select(mapColumn(
		col1 = source@col1,
		load_dt,
		sg_key,
		col_tgt = lkp@col1,
		load_start_dt,
		load_end_dt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRow
SelectRow split(true(),
	isNull(col_tgt),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Output)
ConditionalSplit@Insert derive(load_end_dt = toDate('01/01/9000', 'mm/dd/yyyy')) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn keyGenerate(output(sg_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(input(
		sg_key as integer,
		col1 as integer,
		load_start_dt as timestamp,
		load_end_dt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkInsert
